meta.title: HearMe — Your Voice, Understood
meta.desc: HearMe is a revolutionary AI-powered mobile app that provides personalized speech recognition for individuals with speech impairments.

hero.title: Your Voice. Your Words. Finally Understood.
hero.subtitle: HearMe is a revolutionary AI app that learns your unique speech patterns, giving you the power to communicate clearly and confidently.

features.title: Empowering Your Communication
features.subtitle: Designed for individuals with speech impairments from Cerebral Palsy, stroke, or ALS. HearMe combines advanced AI with an intuitive interface.
features.recognition_desc: Our AI instantly transcribes your speech into text with low latency, enabling seamless and natural conversation flows.
features.output_desc: Play your recognized phrase aloud using clear synthesis, copy the text to clipboard, or send it directly to other apps.
features.personal_desc: The app trains on your specific voice patterns using advanced Machine Learning, becoming more accurate with every use.
features.cloud_desc: Built on Google Cloud infrastructure, ensuring enterprise-grade reliability, speed, and continuous availability of your voice model.
features.secure_desc: Your voice data is yours. We use industry-standard encryption and secure Firebase authentication to protect your privacy.
features.fallback_desc: Recognition uncertain? Instantly select a saved phrase directly on screen. Speak, copy, or share it seamlessly—just like voice input.

howItWorks.title: Your Journey to Clear Speech
howItWorks.subtitle: Getting started is easy. Our step-by-step process ensures the AI adapts to you immediately.
howItWorks.step1_desc: No downloads or app stores required. Simply open HearMe directly in your browser to get started instantly on any device.
howItWorks.step2_desc: Train 5 predefined phrases by recording multiple voice samples for each. This builds a robust baseline model tailored specifically to your speech patterns.
howItWorks.step3_desc: In the full version, you will be able to add custom phrases specific to your life, making the AI smarter and more personalized.
howItWorks.step4_desc: Use the app to speak for you in real-time. Whether text-to-speech or text display, your voice is finally understood.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs. Start for free and upgrade as you grow.
pricing.basic_desc: Perfect for getting started with essential communication tools.
pricing.full_desc: Unlock the full power of personalized AI speech recognition.
pricing.notify_text: Get notified when Full becomes available.
pricing.feat_roadmap: Access to all Roadmap features

roadmap.title: The Future of HearMe
roadmap.subtitle: Our mission goes beyond screens. We are working to integrate HearMe into every aspect of your life, removing barriers in both the digital and physical worlds.
roadmap.item1_desc: Make crystal-clear calls directly within the HearMe app. Connect with friends and family effortlessly, with our AI ensuring your voice is heard perfectly on the other end.
roadmap.item2_desc: Use your personalized voice model to dictate text in any app, directly from your system keyboard.
roadmap.item3_desc: Enhance Siri or Google Assistant with your personalized HearMe model. Control your smart home and devices reliably using the assistants you already know.
roadmap.item4_desc: A future wearable device that works entirely offline. It speaks your words clearly in any language, serving as your personal voice bridge—speech-to-speech, anywhere.
